com.shopify.buy.dataprovider

Interface ProductService

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    BuyClient

    public interface ProductService
    Service that provides Product API endpoints.

      • getProducts

        CancellableTask getProducts(int page,
                            Callback<List<Product>> callback)
        Fetch a page of products
        Parameters:
        page - the 1-based page index. The page size is set by BuyClientBuilder.productPageSize configuration.
        callback - the Callback that will be used to indicate the response from the asynchronous network operation, not null
        Returns:
        cancelable task

      • getProducts

        Fetch a page of products
        Parameters:
        page - the 1-based page index. The page size is set by BuyClientBuilder.productPageSize configuration.
        Returns:
        cold observable that emits the requested list of products

      • getProductTags

        CancellableTask getProductTags(int page,
                               Long collectionId,
                               Callback<List<String>> callback)
        Fetch a page of product tags
        Parameters:
        page - the 1-based page index. The page size is set by BuyClientBuilder.productPageSize configuration.
        collectionId - the collectionId that we want to fetch product tags for, can't be null
        callback - the Callback that will be used to indicate the response from the asynchronous network operation, not null
        Returns:
        cancelable task

      • getProductTags

                                           Long collectionId)

        Parameters:

        collectionId - the collectionId that we want to fetch product tags for, can't be null
        Returns:
        cold observable that emits requested set of tags

      • getProducts

        CancellableTask getProducts(int page,
                            Set<String> tags,
                            Callback<List<Product>> callback)
        Fetch the products filtered by specified tags
        Parameters:
        page - the 1-based page index. The page size is set by BuyClientBuilder.productPageSize configuration.
        tags - set of tags which each product must contain, can be null
        callback - the Callback that will be used to indicate the response from the asynchronous network operation, not null
        Returns:
        cancelable task

      • getProducts

        rx.Observable<List<Product>> getProducts(int page,
                                         Set<String> tags)
        Fetch the products filtered by specified tags
        Parameters:
        page - the 1-based page index. The page size is set by BuyClientBuilder.productPageSize configuration.
        tags - set of tags which each product must contain, can be null
        Returns:
        cold observable that emits requested list of product

      • getProducts

        CancellableTask getProducts(int page,
                            Long collectionId,
                            Set<String> tags,
                            Collection.SortOrder sortOrder,
                            Callback<List<Product>> callback)
        Fetch the products filtered by specified collection and optional tags
        Parameters:
        page - the 1-based page index. The page size is set by BuyClientBuilder.productPageSize configuration.
        collectionId - the collectionId that we want to fetch products for, can't be null
        tags - set of tags which each product must contain, can be null
        sortOrder - the sort order of products for the specified collection, in case of null value Collection.SortOrder#COLLECTION_DEFAULT will be used as default, will be ignored if specified collection id is null
        callback - the Callback that will be used to indicate the response from the asynchronous network operation, not null
        Returns:
        cancelable task

      • getProducts

        rx.Observable<List<Product>> getProducts(int page,
                                         Long collectionId,
                                         Set<String> tags,
                                         Collection.SortOrder sortOrder)
        Fetch the products filtered by specified collection and optional tags
        Parameters:
        page - the 1-based page index. The page size is set by BuyClientBuilder.productPageSize configuration.
        collectionId - the collectionId that we want to fetch products for, can't be null
        tags - set of tags which each product must contain, can be null
        sortOrder - the sort order of products for the specified collection, in case of null value Collection.SortOrder#COLLECTION_DEFAULT will be used as default, will be ignored if specified collection id is null
        Returns:
        cold observable that emits requested list of product
